ygData.subject: Re: I heard about some equipment...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sorry to say, Infiniti, but that s the primary disadvantage of Rallos Zek. You have to recognize that spells are not intelligent and cannot distinguish
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:11 AM 5/31/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Karen" <ka-@...>
>
>Ok, I have a question for you all. I am a level 25 Bard on the Rallos Zek
>server. I have read with interest your emails, suggestions, and tips, but I
>seem to have a problem. I can not use the same songs in the same way as
>you. My sleep song puts EVERYONE but my party to sleep, including other
>players, in fact any NON Party song effects mobs and players. This is a
>real disadvantage to me I believe. Anyone on RZ with any suggestions? Or
>anyone else ? Thanks

Sorry to say, Infiniti, but that's the primary disadvantage of Rallos Zek.
You have to recognize that spells are not intelligent and cannot
distinguish between people you "kinda like" and people you are neutral
towards. Sad to say, this means that area-effect spells can be dangerous.
The only suggestion would be to a) never use them or b) warn people not to
get near you. Heck - that might even make camping easier for you, if all
the players who come near your group keep falling asleep *chuckles*



Talies the Wanderer
Check out the EverQuesting Bard:
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
